00042 KosmosBroker::KosmosBroker(PropertiesPtr &cfg) {
00043   m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00044 
00045   String meta_name = cfg->get_str("Kfs.MetaServer.Name");
00046   int meta_port = cfg->get_i16("Kfs.MetaServer.Port");
00047   m_flush = cfg->get_bool("Kfs.Broker.Flush");
00048 
00049   KfsClientPtr kfsclient = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient(meta_name,
00050                                                                  meta_port);
00051   KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->SetDefaultClient(kfsclient);
00052 }

00062 void
00063 KosmosBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname,
00064                    uint32_t bufsz) {
00065   int fd;
00066   String abspath;
00067   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00068 
00069   HT_DEBUGF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00070 
00071   if (fname[0] == '/')
00072     abspath = fname;
00073   else
00074     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00075 
00076   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Open file: " << abspath << HT_END;
00077 
00078   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_uniq_id);
00079 
00083   if ((fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00084     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00085     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00086     ReportError(cb, fd);
00087     return;
00088   }
00089 
00090   {
00091     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00092     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_RDONLY));
00093 
00094     cb->get_address(addr);
00095 
00096     HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Got fd for file: " << abspath << HT_END;
00097 
00098     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00099 
00100     HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Inserted fd into open file map for file: "<< abspath
00101                  << HT_END;
00102     cb->response(fd);
00103   }
00104 }

00110 void
00111 KosmosBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname,
00112     bool overwrite, int32_t bufsz, int16_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00113   int fd;
00114   int flags;
00115   String abspath;
00116   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00117 
00118   HT_DEBUGF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%lld",
00119             fname, (int)overwrite, (int)bufsz, (int)replication, blksz);
00120 
00121   if (fname[0] == '/')
00122     abspath = fname;
00123   else
00124     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00125 
00126 
00127   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_uniq_id);
00128 
00129   if (overwrite)
00130     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00131   else
00132     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00133 
00134   HT_ERROR_OUT << "Create file: " << abspath << " " << flags << HT_END;
00135 
00139   if ((fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), flags)) < 0) {
00140     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00141     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Create failed: " << errmsg << HT_END;
00142 
00143     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00144     ReportError(cb, fd);
00145     return;
00146   }
00147 
00148   {
00149     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00150     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_WRONLY));
00151 
00152     cb->get_address(addr);
00153 
00154     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00155 
00156     cb->response(fd);
00157   }
00158 }

00160 
00164 void KosmosBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00165   if (m_verbose) {
00166     HT_INFOF("close fd=%d", fd);
00167   }
00168 
00169   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00170 
00171   cb->response_ok();
00172 }

00178 void
00179 KosmosBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00180   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00181   ssize_t nread;
00182   uint64_t offset;
00183   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00184   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00185 
00186   if (m_verbose) {
00187     HT_INFOF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00188   }
00189 
00190   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00191     char errbuf[32];
00192     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00193     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00194     return;
00195   }
00196 
00197   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00198 
00199   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00200     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00201     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00202               errmsg.c_str());
00203     ReportError(cb, nread);
00204     return;
00205   }
00206 
00207   buf.size = nread;
00208 
00209   cb->response(offset, buf);
00210 
00211 }

00217 void
00218 KosmosBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount,
00219                      const void *data, bool sync) {
00220   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00221   ssize_t nwritten;
00222   uint64_t offset;
00223   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00224   int res;
00225 
00226   HT_DEBUGF("append fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00227 
00228   if (!m_flush)
00229     sync = false;
00230 
00231   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00232     char errbuf[32];
00233     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00234     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00235     return;
00236   }
00237 
00238   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00239 
00240   if ((nwritten = clnt->Write(fdata->fd, (const char *) data, (size_t) amount))
00241       < 0) {
00242     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nwritten);
00243     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00244               errmsg.c_str());
00245     ReportError(cb, nwritten);
00246     return;
00247   }
00248 
00249   if (sync && (res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00250     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00251     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00252     ReportError(cb, res);
00253     return;
00254   }
00255 
00256   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00257 
00258   return;
00259 }

00265 void KosmosBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00266   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00267   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00268 
00269   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00270     char errbuf[32];
00271     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00272     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00273     return;
00274   }
00275 
00276   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET))
00277       == (uint64_t) -1) {
00278     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00279     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, offset,
00280               errmsg.c_str());
00281     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00282     return;
00283   }
00284 
00285   cb->response_ok();
00286 }

00292 void KosmosBroker::remove(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *fname) {
00293   String abspath;
00294   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00295   int res;
00296 
00297   HT_DEBUGF("remove file='%s'", fname);
00298 
00299   if (fname[0] == '/')
00300     abspath = fname;
00301   else
00302     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00303 
00304   if ((res = clnt->Remove(abspath.c_str())) < 0) {
00305     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00306     HT_ERRORF("unlink failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00307     ReportError(cb, res);
00308     return;
00309   }
00310 
00311   cb->response_ok();
00312 }

00318 void KosmosBroker::length(ResponseCallbackLength *cb, const char *fname) {
00319   String abspath;
00320   uint64_t length;
00321   int res;
00322   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00323   struct stat statbuf;
00324 
00325    HT_DEBUGF("length file='%s'", fname);
00326 
00327   if (fname[0] == '/')
00328     abspath = fname;
00329   else
00330     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00331 
00332   if ((res = clnt->Stat(abspath.c_str(), statbuf)) < 0) {
00333     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00334     HT_ERRORF("length (stat) failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(),
00335               errmsg.c_str());
00336     ReportError(cb, res);
00337     return;
00338   }
00339   length = statbuf.st_size;
00340   cb->response(length);
00341 }

00347 void
00348 KosmosBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset,
00349                     uint32_t amount) {
00350   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00351   ssize_t nread;
00352   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00353   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00354 
00355   HT_DEBUGF("pread fd=%d offset=%lld amount=%d", fd, offset, amount);
00356 
00357   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00358     char errbuf[32];
00359     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00360     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00361     return;
00362   }
00363 
00364   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET))
00365       == (uint64_t) -1) {
00366     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00367     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, offset,
00368               errmsg.c_str());
00369     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00370     return;
00371   }
00372 
00373   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00374     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00375     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00376               errmsg.c_str());
00377     ReportError(cb, nread);
00378     return;
00379   }
00380 
00381   buf.size = nread;
00382 
00383   cb->response(offset, buf);
00384 }

00386 
00390 void KosmosBroker::mkdirs(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00391   String absdir;
00392   String::size_type curr = 0;
00393   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00394   int res = 0;
00395   struct stat statbuf;
00396 
00397   HT_DEBUGF("mkdirs dir='%s'", dname);
00398 
00399   if (dname[0] == '/')
00400     absdir = dname;
00401   else
00402     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00403 
00404   String path;
00405   while (curr != String::npos) {
00406     curr = absdir.find('/', curr + 1);
00407     if (curr != String::npos)
00408       path.assign(absdir, 0, curr);
00409     else
00410       path = absdir;
00411 
00412     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Stat'ing: " << path << HT_END;
00413 
00414     if (clnt->Stat(path.c_str(), statbuf) == 0) {
00415       if (!S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) {
00416         res = -ENOTDIR;
00417         break;
00418       }
00419       continue;
00420     }
00421     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Mkdir'ing: " << path << HT_END;
00422 
00423     res = clnt->Mkdir(path.c_str());
00424     if (res < 0)
00425       break;
00426   }
00427 
00428   if (res < 0) {
00429     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00430     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00431     ReportError(cb, res);
00432     return;
00433   }
00434 
00435   cb->response_ok();
00436 }

00442 void KosmosBroker::rmdir(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00443   String absdir;
00444   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00445   int res;
00446 
00447   HT_DEBUGF("rmdir dir='%s'", dname);
00448 
00449   if (dname[0] == '/')
00450     absdir = dname;
00451   else
00452     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00453 
00454   if ((res = clnt->Rmdirs(absdir.c_str())) != 0) {
00455     if (res != -ENOENT && res != -ENOTDIR) {
00456       string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00457       HT_ERRORF("rmdir failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(),
00458                 errmsg.c_str());
00459       ReportError(cb, res);
00460       return;
00461     }
00462   }
00463 
00464   cb->response_ok();
00465 }

00467 
00471 void KosmosBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00472   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00473   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00474   int res;
00475 
00476   HT_DEBUGF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00477 
00478   if (m_flush) {
00479     if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00480       char errbuf[32];
00481       sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00482       cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00483       return;
00484     }
00485 
00486     if ((res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00487       string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00488       HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00489       ReportError(cb, res);
00490       return;
00491     }
00492   }
00493 
00494   cb->response_ok();
00495 }

00509 void KosmosBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00510   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00511   cb->response_ok();
00512   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00513 }

00516 void KosmosBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00517   std::vector<String> listing;
00518   std::vector<String> stripped_listing;
00519   String abs_path;
00520   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00521   int error;
00522 
00523   HT_DEBUGF("readdir dir_name='%s'", dname);
00524 
00525   if (dname[0] == '/')
00526     abs_path = dname;
00527   else
00528     abs_path = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00529 
00530   if ((error = clnt->Readdir(abs_path.c_str(), listing)) < 0) {
00531     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00532     HT_ERRORF("readdir failed: file='%s' - %s", abs_path.c_str(),
00533               errmsg.c_str());
00534     ReportError(cb, error);
00535     return;
00536   }
00537 
00538   for (size_t i=0;i<listing.size(); i++) {
00539          if (listing[i] == "." || listing[i] == "..")
00540            continue;
00541          stripped_listing.push_back(listing[i]);
00542        }
00543 
00544   HT_INFOF("Sending back %d listings", (int)stripped_listing.size());
00545 
00546   cb->response(stripped_listing);
00547 }

00555 
00556   if (fname[0] == '/')
00557     abspath = fname;
00558   else
00559     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00560 
00561   cb->response(clnt->Exists(abspath.c_str()));
00562 }

00565 void
00566 KosmosBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00567   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00568   int error;
00569 
00570   HT_DEBUGF("rename %s -> %s", src, dst);
00571 
00572   String abs_src =
00573     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00574   String abs_dst =
00575     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00576 
00577   if ((error = clnt->Rename(src, dst)) < 0)
00578     ReportError(cb, error);
00579   else
00580     cb->response_ok();
00581 }
00582 
00583 
00587 void KosmosBroker::ReportError(ResponseCallback *cb, int error) {
00588 
00589   string errbuf = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00590 
00591   if (error == ENOTDIR || error == ENAMETOOLONG || error == ENOENT)
00592     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf.c_str());
00593   else if (error == EACCES || error == EPERM)
00594     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf.c_str());
00595   else if (error == EBADF)
00596     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf.c_str());
00597   else if (error == EINVAL)
00598     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf.c_str());
00599   else
00600     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf.c_str());
00601 }
